description.narrative: MTR - COs and ROs supported for building and improving systems for Early Childhood, Primary and Secondary level education focused on improving learning outcomes and skills development, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Every Child to Learn By 2021, countries apply child-sensitive policies, innovative community-centered approaches and evidence, to implement development and humanitarian interventions at scale, that enable Every Child to Learn

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House 3 United Nations Plaza New York New York 10017 USA

sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - gender-responsive teaching and learning (excluding SRGBV)
System strengthening - mainstreaming of skills development within national education/training system
System strengthening - responsiveness of education/training system to the labour market

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
